About Me

My Name is Clint Joshua O. Velasquez

A 3rd Year BS - Information Technology in MSU - IIT. Technology has always fascinated me, and I have a strong desire to learn and innovate in this field. I am highly motivated and detail-oriented, which has helped me excel in my coursework so far. I am always on the lookout for new technologies and trends in the industry and am eager to apply my knowledge to real-world problems. Overall, I am passionate about technology and am excited about the opportunities that lie ahead in my career.

First Website

I created this website as our final project on our first year subject about web development, It is not the best website, but I am still a beginner during this time, it talks about the advocacy of Climate Change. How and What we can do to prevent the changing of our world. This website is not the best out there, but it makes me proud.

It is not a fully functional website, but some buttons work and are connected to different pages.

My Hobbies

Playing Genshin Impact

Playing Genshin Impact as a hobby offers an immersive open world filled with adventure, character discovery, and strategic combat, with frequent updates and events to keep players engaged.

Programming

Coding as a hobby is a fun and accessible way to exercise problem-solving skills and unleash creativity by exploring computer programming.

Watching Anime

Watching anime as a hobby offers a fun and diverse way to enjoy captivating storylines, stunning animation, and different cultures. With new releases constantly coming out, it's a great way to relax and escape into fantastical worlds.

Biking

Biking as a hobby is a healthy, exhilarating way to explore and enjoy the freedom of the open road while connecting with nature, challenging yourself physically, and clearing your mind.

Driving

Driving as a hobby is a thrilling way to explore the open road, connect with other enthusiasts, and experience the freedom of mobility.

Reading

Reading as a hobby is a relaxing and enjoyable way to escape into different worlds and explore new ideas. It allows you to expand your knowledge, sharpen your mind, and improve your vocabulary while experiencing the joy of storytelling.

Genshin Mains

Hu Tao

Hu Tao is a popular character in the action role-playing game Genshin Impact. As a five-star Pyro user, she wields a polearm in combat and possesses unique abilities that allow her to drain her own health to deal massive damage to enemies. Hu Tao is often described as cheerful and mischievous, with a fondness for ghost stories and mischief. Her dynamic personality and impressive combat skills have made her a beloved character among fans of the game.

Keqing

Keqing is a highly skilled and formidable character in the action role-playing game Genshin Impact. As the Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing, she possesses powerful Electro abilities and wields a sword in combat. Keqing is known for her confident and independent personality, as well as her intelligence and strategic thinking. Her impressive skills and dynamic personality have made her a fan favorite among players, and she is often considered one of the strongest characters in the game.

Ganyu

Ganyu is a popular character in the action role-playing game Genshin Impact. As a half-human, half-Adeptus creature, she possesses powerful Cryo abilities and wields a bow in combat. Ganyu is often described as kind, diligent, and knowledgeable, and has a passion for astronomy and traditional poetry. Her reserved and gentle demeanor has made her a beloved character among fans, and her unique abilities make her a valuable asset in any player's party.
